Queries.AddGivenInfo: INSERT INTO ct_db.given (InGiven, Total_Given, Given_To, ThroughBy_Given, Given_Date, Remarks_Given, GDT_V, GDT_V_Date, DDT_V_Date, G_Insrt_Person) VALUES (@InGiven, @Total_Given, @Given_To, @ThroughBy_Given, @Given_Date, @Remarks_Given, @GDT_V, @GDT_V_Date, @DDT_V_Date, @G_Insrt_Person);
Queries.UpdateGivenData: UPDATE ct_db.given SET Total_Given = @Total_Given, Given_To = @Given_To, ThroughBy_Given = @ThroughBy_Given, Given_Date = @Given_Date, Remarks_Given = @Remarks_Given, GDT_V_Date = @GDT_V_Date, DDT_V_Date = @DDT_V_Date, G_Updt_Person = @G_Updt_Person WHERE InGiven = @InGiven;
Queries.DeleteGivenData: UPDATE ct_db.given SET GDT_V = @GDT_V, GDT_V_Date = @GDT_V_Date, DDT_V_Date = @DDT_V_Date, G_Del_Person = @G_Del_Person WHERE InGiven = @InGiven;
